import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[sticky,setSticky]=useState(false);// Function to handle scroll events

useEffect(()=>{window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);// Clean up function to remove the event listener
